data.author: John Maynard Keynes
data.quote: The decadent international but individualistic capitalism in the hands of which we found ourselves after the war is not a success. It is not intelligent. It is not beautiful. It is not just. It is not virtuous. And it doesn't deliver the goods.

data.author: Arthur Ashe
data.quote: One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation.

data.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
data.quote: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.

data.author: John F. Kennedy
data.quote: Let every nation know, whether it wishes us well or ill, that we shall pay any price, bear any burden, meet any hardship, support any friend, oppose any foe to assure the survival and the success of liberty.

data.author: Treat Williams
data.quote: I define success as being comfortable with yourself and your life. And that is about as good as it gets, really.

data.author: Eliza Dushku
data.quote: Go big or go home. Because it's true. What do you have to lose?

data.author: Robert Gottlieb
data.quote: Who would have thought that a tap-dancing penguin would outpoint James Bond at the box office? And deserve to? Not that there's anything wrong with 'Casino Royale.' But 'Happy Feet' - written and directed by George Miller - is a complete charmer, even if, in the way of most family fare, it can't resist straying into the Inspirational.

data.author: H. G. Wells
data.quote: The only true measure of success is the ratio between what we might have done and what we might have been on the one hand, and the thing we have made and the things we have made of ourselves on the other.

data.author: Lucille Ball
data.quote: The more things you do, the more you can do.

data.author: Barbra Streisand
data.quote: Success to me is having ten honeydew melons and eating only the top half of each slice.

data.author: Carlos Ghosn
data.quote: You'll never convince me there is a hopeless situation or there is any finality in any success or any failure.

data.author: Walter Pater
data.quote: To burn always with this hard, gem-like flame, to maintain this ecstasy, is success in life.

data.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
data.quote: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.

data.author: Benjamin Jowett
data.quote: Never retreat. Never explain. Get it done and let them howl.

data.author: Pablo Picasso
data.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.

data.author: Anna Deavere Smith
data.quote: President Obama called for a 'we' nation in his Inauguration Address. Art convenes. It is not just inspirational. It is aspirational. It pricks the walls of our compartmentalized minds, opens our hearts and makes us brave. And that's what we need most in our country today.

data.author: John C. Maxwell
data.quote: Success is due to our stretching to the challenges of life. Failure comes when we shrink from them.

data.author: Orison Swett Marden
data.quote: It is the hopeful, buoyant, cheerful attitude of mind that wins. Optimism is a success builder; pessimism an achievement killer.

data.author: Shirley Bassey
data.quote: It's hard for a man to live with a successful woman - they seem to resent you so much. Very few men are generous enough to accept success in their women.

data.author: Robert Browning
data.quote: A minute's success pays the failure of years.

data.author: George S. Patton
data.quote: You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals.

data.author: Theodore Roosevelt
data.quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.

data.author: Joe Paterno
data.quote: Success without honor is an unseasoned dish; it will satisfy your hunger, but it won't taste good.

data.author: Monica Seles
data.quote: That's the key to success, isn't it? It has to be fun.

data.author: Christie Hefner
data.quote: I don't think about financial success as the measurement of my success.
